name: Refulgent - Feather Dust (DEMO)
description:
A queer coming of age story where things happen.

Very weird things; like, 'there's a goat girl living in a necklace' weird. And apparently there's human experimentation going on too? Angel's Light isn't your normal city, that's for sure.

This game deals with dark/adult themes and the player(s) should take all necessary precautions to assure harm is not done. A content warning is displayed at the start to mitigate harm.

This demo features an original soundtrack, story, and some of my art of questionable quality.

Made with RPG Maker VX Ace. Only runs on Windows right now. All installments of this game will be completely free until I compile them all together. Donations are appreciated though! :)

KNOWN BUGS:

-Images staying on screen/not being deleted. I think I caught them all, but there may be some remaining. I will work hard to remove any issues in this regard.

Thank you for playing/reading this far!

CHANGELOG:

01/04/22 - Changed a certain boss's HP because it's already troll-y enough.

01/04/22 - Changed Mirai's last name. (IDK HOW I GOT IT, BUT IT WAS A NARUTO SHIP???)

01/04/22 - Changed the stats screen (no longer displays the wrong type of attack for GRIT party members).

01/04/22 - Edited the transparency of unusable items because the grey was really ugly.    :(

01/04/22 - Added new graphics for collectables.

01/04/22 - Added additional checks to battle wins.
